subject: Colleges and Universities
Basketball (College)
College Athletics
Cheating
lead_paragraph: An N.C.A.A. report found that two men with close ties to Syracuse athletics had used the Y.M.C.A. in Oneida, N.Y., as a haven for handouts to players and university employees.
snippet: An N.C.A.A. report found that two men with close ties to Syracuse athletics had used the Y.M.C.A. in Oneida, N.Y., as a haven for handouts to players and university employees.
